actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to provide a study to be made of surge and hazardous entrance conditions at the entrance to Mission Bay Harbor, San Diego, Calif.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Corps of Engineers, to study the hazardous conditions on the Mission Bay Harbor Entrance Channel, Quivira Basin, and Mariners Cove, California.

titles.title: A bill to provide a study to be made of surge and hazardous entrance conditions at the entrance to Mission Bay Harbor, San Diego, Calif.
